title: Critical DB Parameters / Kritik Veritabanı Parametreleri
description: Shows critical database parameters and their current values

queries.sql: SELECT name, value, type, isdefault FROM v$parameter WHERE name IN ('processes', 'open_cursors', 'sga_target', 'pga_aggregate_target', 'audit_trail', 'db_recovery_file_dest', 'compatible', 'db_name', 'memory_target') ORDER BY name

doc_hint: Shows critical database parameters and whether they differ from defaults. Use to verify configuration against EBS best practices.
analysis_prompt: Review critical parameters. Check: (1) if processes is high enough for concurrent load, (2) if open_cursors is adequate, (3) memory allocation settings, (4) audit trail enabled.
